title: Ren gui she hu da jue dou

sources.title: Ren gui she hu da jue dou (1978)
sources.description: Carter Wong stars in this Hong Kong classic as a powerful martial artist who must protect an old man and his daughter from a snake god who possesses deadly kung fu skills. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/ren-gui-she-hu-da-jue-dou-1978/

metadata.Plot: Master Wong and his daughter Wong Koo must get help from the mysterious wanderer Yuk-long when The snake god Choy Ching Sing wants to force Wong Koo to marry him.
metadata.Actors: Carter Wong, Lik Cheung, Ya-Ying Liu
